solution_line_template: The total time taken for the whole journey is {arrival_hour}:00-{pickup_hour}:00 = <<{arrival_hour}-{pickup_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours.
The total time taken in minutes is {total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes.

If it takes {minutes_to_first_station} minutes to reach the first station, then the rest of the journey takes {total_minutes} - {minutes_to_first_station} = <<{total_minutes}-{minutes_to_first_station}={time_from_first_station}>>{time_from_first_station} minutes.
